p: TSS of green beans samples decreased at the beginning of storage in all samples and then slightly increased in AsA, PMO and controls at the end of storage ( Supplementary Table S2). The results in Figure 2B indicated that samples treated with ethanol and PMO had a higher TSS than the control after 3 d of storage. However, for the last three storage periods (9, 12, and 15 d), there was no major difference among all treatments.
